title: I want to know why i dont have any rp on my new pbe account
body: I dont know why, but i just got access to my brand new pbe account and i have 0 rp on it. Please help.~~~~

replies.body:
New PBE accounts never start with currency, but a script is constantly running checking for new accounts it needs to give RP/BE to. Typically after logging in and playing a game or two, you'll see that currency appear after restarting your client. 

If you still haven't seen any RP/BE by tomorrow, let me know and I'll take a look!
Oddly, I had the full RP and BE amount, but a day after when the store opened again, most of it was gone, leaving me with 3000 RP and 5 BE. Is it a bug or something?
